name: cement, unspecified, import from Europe | cement, unspecified | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/15844/documentation

This dataset represents the amount of imported cement, unspecified from Europe to Switzerland. The import value is assumed to be valid for the current year.

This activity represents the point of 'handing over' the cement, unspecified from one country to the other at the border.

The activity ends with cement, unspecified which is supplied to the generic market for cement, unspecified.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.timeDescription: The annual production volume is assumed to be valid for the current year.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset represents 'cement, unspecified' import from Europe to Switzerland.
